lore.text: This attack does 10 less damage for every time it is used on consecutive turns
This Hermit restores all HP, then sleeps for the rest of this turn, and the following two turns, before waking up.
If heads, do an additional 40hp damage.
If heads, choose one attack of your opponent's current active Hermit to disable on their next turn.
If this Hermit is knocked out before the start of your next turn, they are revived with 50hp.
If heads, all status effects are removed from your active and AFK Hermits.
Use an attack from any of your opponent's Hermits.
Any effect card attached to your opponent's active Hermit is ignored during this turn.
Attack the Hermit directly opposite your active Hermit on the game board.
When used with a Bow or Crossbow effect card, Bow or Crossbow damage doubles.
You can choose to remove 50hp from this Hermit and give it to any AFK Hermit on the game board.
If heads, on your opponent's next turn, flip a coin.
If heads, your opponent's active Hermit attacks themselves.
If you have AFK Docm77, Bdubs AND Etho on the game board, attack damage doubles.
Attack damage doubles versus Builder types.
Heal all Hermits that are adjacent to your active Hermit 40hp.
After your attack, both players must choose an AFK Hermit to set as their active Hermit, unless they have no AFK Hermits.
Your opponent chooses their active Hermit first.
If tails, attack damage is halved.
If heads, your opponent skips their next turn. Time Skip can not be used consecutively if successful.
If heads, you draw an extra card at the end of your turn.
You can choose to attack one of your opponent's AFK Hermits. If you do this, you must discard one item card attached to your active Hermit.
If heads, your opponent must discard any effect card attached to their active Hermit.Only one effect card per Hermit can be discarded using this ability.
If heads, do an additional 30hp damage to your opponent's active Hermit and 10hp damage to each Hermit below it on the game board.
If heads, steal the attached effect card of your opponent's active Hermit, and then choose to attach or discard it.
You and your opponent's active Hermits take damage equal to your active Hermit's health.
Any damage this Hermit takes due to this ability can not be redirected.
Do an additional 20hp damage for every heads. Total attack damage doubles if you have at least one AFK Prankster on the game board.
If both are heads, your opponent must attack one of their own AFK Hermits on their next turn. Your opponent must have the necessary item cards attached to execute an attack.
Use an attack from any of your AFK Hermits.
If your opponent uses a single use effect card on their next turn, flip a coin.
If heads, you take that card after its effect is applied and add it to your hand.
If this Hermit's HP is orange (190~100), do an additional 20hp damage.
If this Hermit's HP is red (90 or less), do an additional 40hp damage.
Flip a coin 3 times.Do an additional 20hp damage for every heads.
If heads, poison your opponent's active Hermit.
If heads, burn your opponent's active Hermit.
For each of your AFK Bdubs or Tangos on the game board, do an additional 40hp damage, up to a maximum of 80hp additional damage.
If heads, your opponent must choose a card to discard from their hand.
After your attack, your opponent must choose an AFK Hermit to set as their active Hermit, unless they have no AFK Hermits.
After attack, you can choose to go AFK.
At the end of your turn, you may use an additional single use effect card.
If your opponent attacks on their next turn, flip a coin.
If heads, their attack misses. Your opponent can not miss due to this ability on consecutive turns.
The Hermit this card is attached to can use items of any type. Once attached, this card can not be removed from this Hermit.
When the Hermit this card is attached to takes damage, that damage is reduced by up to 10hp each turn.
When the Hermit this card is attached to is knocked out, all attached item cards are returned to your hand.
Remove poison and bad omen from one of your Hermits.
If attached, prevents the Hermit this card is attached to from being poisoned.
Remove burn and String from one of your Hermits.
If attached, prevents the Hermit this card is attached to from being burned.
Prevents any damage from effect cards and any damage redirected by effect cards to the Hermit this card is attached to.
Attach to any of your AFK Hermits. On that Hermits first turn after becoming active, any damage done to that Hermit is prevented, and then this card is discarded.
If any of your Hermits take damage on your opponent's turn, your opponent's active Hermit takes 20hp damage for each Wolf card you have on the game board.
Use like a Hermit card with a maximum 50hp.
You can not attach any cards to this card. While this card is active, you can not attack, or use damaging effect cards.
If this card is knocked out, it does not count as a knockout.
Attach to your active Hermit. This Hermit restores all HP, then sleeps for the rest of this turn, and the following two turns, before waking up. Discard after your Hermit wakes up.
When the Hermit this card is attached to takes damage, that damage is reduced by up to 20hp each turn.
All damage done to your Hermits on your opponent's turn is taken by the Hermit this card is attached to.
Discard after use. Only one of these cards can be attached to your Hermits at a time.
When the Hermit this card is attached to takes damage, that damage is reduced by up to 60hp, and then this card is discarded.
Attach to one of your opponent's empty item or effect slots.
Your opponent can no longer attach cards to that slot.
When the Hermit this card is attached to takes damage, your opponent's active Hermit takes 20hp damage.
If the Hermit this card is attached to is knocked out, they are revived with 10hp.
Does not count as a knockout. Discard after use.
When the Hermit this card is attached to takes damage, that damage is reduced by up to 30hp each turn.
When the Hermit this card is attached to takes damage, your opponent's active Hermit takes 30hp damage.
When the Hermit this card is attached to takes damage, that damage is reduced by up to 40hp each turn.
When the Hermit this card is attached to takes damage, your opponent's active Hermit takes 40hp damage.
Do 30hp damage to the Hermit directly opposite your active Hermit on the game board, and 10hp damage to each Hermit below it.
Discard 2 cards in your hand. Draw 2.
Can not be used if you do not have 2 cards to discard.
Your opponent can not make their active Hermit go AFK on their next turn.
Before your attack, move your active Hermit and any attached cards to any open row on the game board. Your active Hermit also takes 10hp damage.
Discard one attached item or effect card from any of your Hermits.
You can use another single use effect card this turn.
Can be used even if you do not have any cards in your hand.
If heads, your opponent's next attack misses. If tails, their attack damage doubles.
Do 20hp damage to your opponent's active Hermit.
After your attack, your opponent must choose an AFK Hermit to set as their active Hermit, unless they have no AFK Hermits.
If heads, choose one item card attached to your opponent's active Hermit and add it to your hand.
Move one of your attached item cards to an adjacent Hermit.
You can use another single use effect card this turn.
Give your opponent's active Hermit bad omen for their next 3 turns.
Do 40hp damage to one of your opponent's AFK Hermits.
After your attack, choose an AFK Hermit to set as your active Hermit.
Do 20hp damage to up to 3 of your opponent's active or AFK Hermits.
Your opponent must discard any effect card attached to their active Hermit.
Do 40hp damage to your opponent's active Hermit.
Use an attack from your active Hermit without having the necessary item cards attached.
After your attack, choose one of your opponent's AFK Hermits to set as their active Hermit, and then flip a coin.
If heads, also do 10hp damage to that Hermit.
Any coin flips on this turn are not required, as heads is assumed.
Move one of your opponent's attached item cards from their active Hermit to any of their AFK Hermits.
Move your active Hermit's attached effect card to any of your AFK Hermits.
Look at your opponent's hand, and then flip a coin.
If heads, choose one card to discard from your opponent's hand.
Do 30hp damage to your opponent's active Hermit, and then flip a coin.
If heads, this card is returned to your hand.
Choose one card from your discard pile and return it to your hand.
Steal or swap the attached effect card of your opponent's active Hermit.
Heal one of your AFK Hermits 100hp.
Do 40hp damage to your opponent's active Hermit.
Any effect card attached to your opponent's active Hermit is ignored during this turn.
Before your attack, swap your active Hermit card with one of your adjacent AFK Hermit card.
All cards attached to both Hermits, including health, remain in place. Your active Hermit remains active after swapping.
Do 60hp damage to your opponent's active Hermit. Your active Hermit also takes 20hp damage.
Your opponent's active Hermit can only use their primary attack on their next turn.
Your opponent's active Hermit is weak to your active Hermit's type for 3 turns.
Your opponent must discard any effect cards attached to their active Hermit and any adjacent Hermits.
Do 60hp damage to your opponent's active Hermit.
Your opponent skips their next turn.
This card can not be returned to your hand from your discard pile.
Choose one of your opponent's AFK Hermits to take all damage done during this turn.
